benchmark_details.name: LibEval
benchmark_details.overview: LibEval is a benchmark designed to evaluate the performance in the library migration recommendation task, assessing the effectiveness of various LLMs using 2,888 migration records.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the performance of LibRec in recommending target libraries for library migration.

data.source: Data was extracted from 2,324 Python repositories focusing specifically on library migrations.
data.annotation: Migration intents were extracted from commit messages using LLMs.

methodology.calculation: Precision @k measures the inclusion of the correct target library within the top-k recommendations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better recommendation performance.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through human evaluation of the extracted migration intents.
